title: Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519/2020)), the Minister for Finance, the Minister
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Electronic Commerce Act 2000
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Electronic Commerce Act 2000 

(Application of sections 12 to 23 to Registered Land) Regulations 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited electronic commerce act 2000 (application section 12 23 registered land) regulation 2022

title: Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519/2020)), the Minister for Finance, the Minister
heading: In these Regulations “registered land” has the meaning given to it by
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “registered land” has the meaning given to it by 

section 3(1) of the Registration of Title Act 1964 (No. 16 of 1964).
text_norm: 2 regulation registered land meaning given section 3(1) registration title act 1964 (no 16 1964)

title: Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519/2020)), the Minister for Finance, the Minister
heading: 3. Sections 12 to 23 of the Electronic Commerce Act 2000 shall apply to
text_raw:
3. Sections 12 to 23 of the Electronic Commerce Act 2000 shall apply to 
the law governing the manner in which an interest in registered land may be 
created, acquired, disposed of or registered. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 February 2022. 

EAMON RYAN 

Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 15th February, 2022.
